Name: Monocity
About the game: Monocity Monocity is a multiplayer real estate board game. The game supports up to 20 players. Gameplay Each round: All players roll the dice and move together, and the player who bids the highest price for the land gets the land. Collect resources, build buildings, upgrade them, increase population, use cards, trade with players, and more. Make other players go bankrupt. Content 2 maps 9 types of land 2 types of resource 7 unique buildings 10 cards AI Player Map Editor & more updates
